body.p: A odfcontent element tells where the module shall search for its content. The template of the module must have a processing instructions (PI) of type importodf, see: to realize the actual extraction of content.
A Module may contain any number of ODFContent elements.

tr.td: Any string that represents a file, either as an absolute URI or as an URI relative to the active anchor.

Any string that represents a file, either as an absolute URI or as an URI relative to the active anchor. Is used if location for some reason is not availabe. It is not a backup in the sense that the primary file is stored here. It is up to you to supply a meaningfull backup file.
An id that identifies this odfcontent in importodf in a template.
